Text:
There is a problem in the sound mix on this torrent. Human voice comes from the right, and music/other sound comes from the left channel.

@ameet6233 - is there a workaround (other than forcing mono sound)

Or maybe you could just reupload with the corrected sound.

I am using VLC 2.0.0
yes same exact problem :( please re-upload, but quality is pretty great(awesome) A/V=10/10!!
I mean video is of great quality as well as audio but only it comes form a single side :(

guys its not my fault the original bluray is messed up... it is the worst bluray transfer for a telugu movie till date.
video is very dull and has less contrast
audio is complete crap.. all dialogues are from right channel..

For better results 
decrease brightness upto 35-40%
and increase contrast upto 50%
and select your audio device as mono
